query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `knowledge_base_articles` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `category` varchar(100),
  `tags` json,
  `views` int DEFAULT 0,
  `helpful` int DEFAULT 0,
  `notHelpful` int DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user KrGaEuKwKPW5NAp.root --database mP6FLm6cHUyVdEMNViNuZS --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `knowledge_base_articles` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `category` varchar(100),
  `tags` json,
  `views` int DEFAULT 0,
  `helpful` int DEFAULT 0,
  `notHelpful` int DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
